name: Save Me Too
description:
Choice your couples and save them from danger, avoid obstacles.

Discover new levels with different obstacles and speed.

Can you pass them all ?
Unlock achievement ! ( possible to unlock 3 with stages and 3 with best score in endless mode)
Get best score in Endless mode !

This game is build for Android and its available on Google Play, but decide to make it as well playable on web . Arrow buttons work on mobile only.  (BTW. Control is better on mobile)

To control game on web use keyboard arrows , and mouse to press Next , Menu etc buttons.
